body_html:
Part of the issue is that tf.slice is not able to figure out the shape if the size is -1. So slice tensor in the code snippet has the shape of [None, None, None, None]. That triggers the error.

There was a PR #13561 to improve the shape function of tf.slice though it was not a complete fix.
body_text:
Part of the issue is that tf.slice is not able to figure out the shape if the size is -1. So slice tensor in the code snippet has the shape of [None, None, None, None]. That triggers the error.
There was a PR #13561 to improve the shape function of tf.slice though it was not a complete fix.
body:
Part of the issue is that `tf.slice` is not able to figure out the shape if the size is `-1`. So `slice` tensor in the code snippet has the shape of `[None, None, None, None]`. That triggers the error.

There was a PR #13561 to improve the shape function of `tf.slice` though it was not a complete fix.
